		});

flex-grid padVertLg eepModal"> <h2>Try Enhanced Profile Free for a Month</h2> <p>Explore the many benefits of having a premium branded profile on Glassdoor, like increased influence and advanced analytics.</p> <div class="margBot"> <i class="feaIllustration"></i> </div> <a href='/employers/enhanced/pricing_input.htm?src=info_mod' class='gd-btn gd-btn-link gradient gd-btn-1 gd-btn-med <div id='EmpBasicInfo' class='module empBasicInfo ' data-emp-id='247538'> <header class='tbl fill'> <h2 class='cell middle tightVert blockMob'> Riot Games Overview</h2> </header> <div class='info flexbox row col-hh'> <div class='infoEntity'> <label>Website</label> <span class='value website'><a class="link" href="http://www.riotgames.com" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer">www.riotgames.com</a></span> </div> <div class='infoEntity'> <label>Headquarters</label> <span class='value'>Los Angeles, CA</span> </div> <div class='infoEntity'> <label>Size</label> <span class='value'>1001 to 5000 employees</span> </div> <div class='infoEntity'> <label>Founded</label> <span class='value'> 2006</span> </div> <div class='infoEntity'> <label>Type</label> <span class='value'> Company - Private</span> </div> <div class='infoEntity'> <label>Industry</label> <span class='value'> Media</span> </div> <div class='infoEntity'> <label>Revenue</label> <span class='value'> Unknown / Non-Applicable</span> </div> </div> <div data-full="We were established in 2006 by a couple of entrepreneurial gamers who believe player-focused game development can result in awesome games. In 2009, we released our debut title, League of Legends, to critical and player acclaim. Over 100 million play every month. We know players form the foundation of our community and it&amp;rsquo;s for them that we continue to evolve and improve the League of Legends experience. Headquartered just a couple miles from the beach in Los Angeles, California, Riot was featured on Fortune&amp;rsquo;s 100 Best Companies to Work For list in 2016. Riot also ranked on Fortune&#039;s &amp;quot;25 Best Companies to Work for in Technology&amp;quot;, &amp;quot;100 Best Workplaces for Millennials&amp;quot;, and &amp;quot;50 Best Workplaces for Flexibility&amp;quot; lists, accolades based on Glassdoor reviews of Riot by Rioters." class='margTop empDescription'> We were established in 2006 by a couple of entrepreneurial gamers who believe player-focused game development can result in awesome games. In 2009, we released our debut title, League of Legends, to critical and player acclaim. Over 100 million play every month. We know players ... <span class='link minor moreLink' id='ExpandDesc'>Read more</span> </div> <div> <p data-full="<b>Mission: </b>Riot aspires to be the most player-focused company in the world." class='tightBot'> <b>Mission: </b> Riot aspires to be the most player-focused company in the world.</p> </div> <div class='hr'><hr/></div> <h3 class='margTop'>Glassdoor Awards</h3> <div class="table"> <div class="cell middle padRt"> <svg width="24px" height="29px" viewBox="0 0 28 34" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"> <defs></defs> <g transform="translate(51.000000, 345.000000)"> <g transform="translate(0.000000, 1.000000)"> <g> <path d="M6.76,0.258064516 L19.24,0.258064516 L19.24,11.6129032 C19.24,15.0193548 16.432,17.8064516 C3.55271368e-15,2.83870968 1.456,12.1290323 8.268,15.6387097" id="Shape"></path> <path d="M19.24,2.83870968 L26,2.83870968 C26,2.83870968 24.544,12.1290323 17.732,15.6387097" id="Shape"></path> <path d="M13,27.0967742 C13,27.0967742 15.08,31.7419355 19.24,31.7419355 L13,31.7419355 L6.76,31.7419355 C10.92,31.7419355 13,27.0967742 13,27.0967742 L13,27.0967742 Z" id="Shape"></path> <path d="M13,17.8064516 L13,27.0967742" id="Shape"></path> <polygon id="Shape" points="13.78 8.25806452 13 6.29677419 12.22 8.25806452 10.14 8.41290323 11.752 9.75483871 11.232 11.7677419 13 10.6322581 14.768 11.7677419 14.248 9.75483871 15.86 8.41290323"></polygon> </g> </g> </g> </g> </g> </g> </g> </g> </svg></div> <div class="cell middle"> <p class="noMargTop noMargBot"> Best Places to Work: <a href='/Award/Best-Places-to-Work-2016-LST_KQ0,24.htm'>2016</a> (#18)</p> </div> </div> </div><div id='CompanyUpdates' class='module noPad'> <div class='tbl fill'> <header> <h2>Company Updates</h2> </header> </div><div id='CompanyUpdatesList'> <ul class='companyUpdates'> <li class='companyUpdate' data-id='127068' data-emp-id='247538' data-pinned='0'> <div class='tbl fill'> <div class='cell logo'> <span class='sqLogo tighten smSqLogo'> <img data-original='https://media.glassdoor.com/sqls/247538/riot-games-squarelogo.png' data-original-2x='https://media.glassdoor.com/sqlm/247538/riot-games-squarelogo.png' src='' class=' lazy' data-retina-ok='true' alt='Riot Games Logo' title=''/> </span> </div> <div class='cell'> <p class='updateText tightTop'> We pull back the curtain on the Riot Rumble, and two teams destined to clash in an epic showdown, because whatever else they are, they’re definitely (not) rivals.</p> <span class='minor hidden padLtSm'>&mdash;30+ days ago</span> <div class='embed tbl margBotSm fill'> <div class='cell imgCell padRt'> <a href='http://glassdoor.com/slink.htm?key=vQnu9' target='_blank' rel='nofollow noreferrer'> <div class='imgPrev lazy media' data-original='https://media.glassdoor.com/companyupdate/st2x/247538/riot-games-companyupdate-1485990358187.jpg' data-background-size='100%'></div> </a> </div> <div class='cell span-1-1'> <div class='rel'> <a href='http://glassdoor.com/slink.htm?key=vQnu9' target='_blank' rel='nofollow noreferrer' class='h4'>Riot Rumble<i class='offsite margLtSm'></i></a> <br/> <p class='linkDesc noMarg subtle'>Rioters compete in an internal League of Legends tournament called the Riot Rumble for glory, bragging rights, and a truly sick jacket. After years of fierce battles on the Rift, storied rivalries emerged in every bracket, Bronze to Diamond.</p> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </li> <li class='companyUpdate' data-id='109674' data-emp-id='247538' data-pinned='0'> <div class='tbl fill'> <div class='cell logo'> <span class='sqLogo tighten smSqLogo'> <img data-original='https://media.glassdoor.com/sqls/247538/riot-games-squarelogo.png' data-original-2x='https://media.glassdoor.com/sqlm/247538/riot-games-squarelogo.png' src='' class=' lazy' data-retina-ok='true' alt='Riot Games Logo' title=''/> </span> </div> <div class='cell'> <p class='updateText tightTop'> Take an inside look at the (often intense) Rumble competition, where Rioters battle it out on the Rift for fun, pride, and a sweet jacket.</p> <span class='minor hidden padLtSm'>&mdash;30+ days ago</span> <div class='embed tbl margBotSm fill'> <div class='cell imgCell padRt'> <a href='http://glassdoor.com/slink.htm?key=vQay9' target='_blank' rel='nofollow noreferrer'> <div class='imgPrev lazy media' data-original='https://media.glassdoor.com/companyupdate/st2x/247538/riot-games-companyupdate-1481958237392.jpg' data-background-size='100%'></div> </a> </div> <div class='cell span-1-1'> <div class='rel'> <a href='http://glassdoor.com/slink.htm?key=vQay9' target='_blank' rel='nofollow noreferrer' class='h4'>Why We Rumble: A Rioter&#039;s Battle for Bronze Glory<i class='offsite margLtSm'></i></a> <br/> <p class='linkDesc noMarg subtle'>Author: Ryan &#034;Cactopus&#034; Rigney As Riot has grown, so has Rumble. With hundreds of Rioters participating, the competitive aspect of the tournament has only intensified-there can only be one winning team per division each season, and the victors get a swanky custom-made jacket with their summoner name emblazoned on the back.</p> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </li> </ul></div> <a href='/Updates/Riot-Games-Company-Updates-E247538.htm' class='moreBar'> <span class='middle'>See All</span> <i class='arrowSm rt margLtSm'><span>See All</span></i> </a> </div><div class='whyWorkForUsModule module' id='WWFU-247538'> <header> <h2>Riot Games &ndash; Why Work For Us?</h2> </header> <div id="WhyWorkForUsEditableContent" class='whyWorkForUsContent'> <div class='tbl showHH fill'> <label for="WhyWorkForUsSelect" class="hidden">Why Work For Us?</label> <select id='WhyWorkForUsSelect' class='std med fill' name='whyWorkForUs'> <option value='9732'>About Us</option> <option value='9733'>Working at Riot</option> <option value='9734'>Our Culture</option> <option value='9735'>Our Benefits</option> <option value='9736'>Internships</option> <option value='9737'>The Riot Manifesto</option> </select> </div> <div id='WhyWorkForUsTabs' class='std tabs anchorTabs nogradient padLt moreTabs'> <ul id='WhyWorkForUsTabBar' class='padRt hideHH'> <li> <a href='#WhyWorkForUsTab-9732' data-id='9732'> About Us</a> </li> <li> <a href='#WhyWorkForUsTab-9733' data-id='9733'> Working at Riot</a> </li> <li> <a href='#WhyWorkForUsTab-9734' data-id='9734'> Our Culture</a> </li> <li> <a href='#WhyWorkForUsTab-9735' data-id='9735'> Our Benefits</a> </li> <li> <a href='#WhyWorkForUsTab-9736' data-id='9736'> Internships</a> </li> <li class='moreTab'> <a href='#WhyWorkForUsTab-' data-id=''> <span class='link more p noMargVert'> More<i class='expanded margLtSm'></i> </span> </a> <ul class='undecorated selectboxit-options'> <li class='selectboxit-option'> <a href='#WhyWorkForUsTab-9737' class='selectboxit-option-anchor' data-id='9737'>The Riot Manifesto</a> </li> </ul> </li> </ul> <hr class='tabs-border hideHH'/> <div id='WhyWorkForUsTab-9732' class='overviewSectionBody ' data-created='2013-08-21 11:47:42.463' data-updated='2017-03-25 02:51:33.757'> <div id='WhyWorkForUs-9732' class='employerSuppliedContent'> <p><img class="lazy" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/eep/247538/WeAreRiotersfullsize.compress.gd.jpg" alt="undefined" width="621" height="226"/></p> <p>We aspire to be the most player-focused game company in the world. Riot Games was established in 2006 by a couple of entrepreneurial gamers who believe player-focused game development can result in awesome games. In 2009, we released our debut title, <em>League of Legends</em>, to critical and player acclaim. Over 67 million play every month.</p> <p>We know players form the foundation of our community and it’s for them that we continue to evolve and improve the <em>League of Legends</em> experience.</p> <p><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/eep/247538/riot_map_v1glassdoor.compress.gd.jpg" alt="undefined" width="619" height="303" class="lazy"/></p> <p><strong>WHERE WE PLAY</strong></p> <p>Riot Games’ HQ is based in sunny Los Angeles, California, but we’ve got <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/riot-manifesto">17 offices across</a>&nbsp;the globe. Our international teams ensure that player experiences aren’t lost in translation - no matter your latitude and longitude, you’re still a Rioter.</p></div> <div class='fadeOut gradient hidden'></div> <div class='link moreBar hidden'> <span>Read more</span> <i class='arrowSm margLtSm'></i> </div> </div> <div id='WhyWorkForUsTab-9733' class='overviewSectionBody offScreen' data-created='2013-08-21 11:47:42.47' data-updated='2017-03-25 02:51:33.757'> <div id='WhyWorkForUs-9733' class='employerSuppliedContent'> <p><img class="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/eep/247538/WorkingAtRiotfullsize.compress.gd.jpg" alt="undefined" width="621" height="391"/></p> <p><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.4em;">We work in a collaborative, fast-paced and learning-rich environment with a veteran development team anchored by accomplished leaders in engineering, design, art, publishing and more. We don't believe in micro-management - Rioters have lots of room to manage themselves, and teams of Rioters operate with tons of freedom to unleash their creativity.</span><br/></p> <p>Let’s be real about the pace of life at Riot. Rioters work hard. That’s because constantly delighting and earning player trust is hard work. And it’s also because Riot’s an unabashed meritocracy -- where professional competence, quality of craft, and ultimate delivery of extraordinary results matter a great deal. Rewards and recognition are allocated based on performance, not seniority, likability, or anything else.</p> <p>So we work hard. But not stupid hard. Healthy professional careers are built sustainably. Crushing it for a month or a quarter and then burning out isn’t healthy. We expect everyone at Riot to establish a high-performance pace that they can comfortably sustain for years. And we expect Rioters to take advantage of our open PTO policy (see “Our Benefits” section) to relax, recharge, and reinvigorate .</p> <p>Riot's a global company – in addition to the Los Angeles headquarters (located just minutes from the beach), we've got outposts in <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20141007/1526/riot-games-berlin">Berlin</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150519/1542/riot-games-brighton">Brighton</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20141201/530/riot-games-dublin">Dublin</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150519/1194/riot-games-hong-kong">Hong Kong</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150512/255/riot-games-istanbul">Istanbul</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150519/1634/riot-games-mexico-city">Mexico City</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150519/529/riot-games-moscow">Moscow</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150519/950/riot-games-new-york">New York</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150512/504/riot-games-st-louis">St. Louis</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150519/1670/riot-games-santiago">Santiago</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150519/500/riot-games-sao-paulo">S&atilde;o Paulo</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150508/528/riot-games-seoul">Seoul</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150615/1688/riot-games-shanghai">Shanghai</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150512/678/riot-games-sydney">Sydney</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150512/936/riot-games-taipei">Taipei</a>, and <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150519/1248/riot-games-tokyo">Tokyo</a>.</p></div> <div class='fadeOut gradient hidden'></div> <div class='link moreBar hidden'> <span>Read more</span> <i class='arrowSm margLtSm'></i> </div> </div> <div id='WhyWorkForUsTab-9734' class='overviewSectionBody offScreen' data-created='2013-08-21 11:47:42.47' data-updated='2017-03-25 02:51:33.76'> <div id='WhyWorkForUs-9734' class='employerSuppliedContent'> <p><img class="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/eep/247538/OurCulturefullsize.compress.gd.jpg" alt="undefined" width="621" height="414"/></p> <p><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.4em;">Our goal is to become the most player-focused company in the world. With this mission in mind, we develop high-quality games and services enjoyed by </span><a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.4em;" href="https://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.riotgames.com%2Four-games&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AFQjCNFiefqzmRBp54x8sh9lqDqQ-zM35w">tens of millions</a><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.4em;">&nbsp;of players around the world.</span><br/></p> <p>To help ensure that every hire is truly onboard and aligned with our mission to serve players, we rigorously screen every candidate not just for skill and experience but also for cultural fit. To this end, we also <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20140619/1304/announcing-queue-dodge">offer new hires cash to quit</a>&nbsp;-- because we want everyone here to be really bought in to our mission and values.</p> <p>We also take play seriously. For us, it’s never &quot;just a game.&quot; We play lots of games, especially our own. Everyone’s first day at Riot begins with a play test. We try to make it a daily habit. Although we’re serious professionals, we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Whether it’s memes in presentations, squirt guns at Show & Tell, or the PC Bangs built into the heart of new offices, we make time for play and fun.<br/></p> <p>At our core, we're a group of passionate people who embrace new challenges, thrive in finding smart, out-of-the-box solutions, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20120208/554/riot-lost-found">sometimes lose things</a> , and love <em>League of Legends</em> and this industry. If this sounds like a team you'd like to be a part of, check out our job openings in&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=884&depts=">Los Angeles</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1967&depts=">Berlin</a>,&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1430&depts=">Brighton</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=2255&depts=">Mexico City</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1246&depts=">Dublin</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1423&depts=">Hong Kong</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1424&depts=">Istanbul</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1425&depts=">Moscow</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1093&depts=">New York</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=886&depts=">St. Louis</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1426&depts=">S&atilde;o Paulo</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="https://signup.leagueoflegends.co.kr/Recruit/recruit.php">Seoul</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1427&depts=">Sydney</a>,&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers?location%5B%5D=9&search=&offices=1428&depts=">Taipei</a>, <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers/?offices=1429&depts=">Tokyo</a>, and <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers/?offices=1957&depts=">Santiago</a>.<br/></p></div> <div class='fadeOut gradient hidden'></div> <div class='link moreBar hidden'> <span>Read more</span> <i class='arrowSm margLtSm'></i> </div> </div> <div id='WhyWorkForUsTab-9735' class='overviewSectionBody offScreen' data-created='2013-08-21 11:47:42.477' data-updated='2017-03-25 02:51:33.76'> <div id='WhyWorkForUs-9735' class='employerSuppliedContent'> <p style="text-align: center;"><img class="lazy" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/eep/247538/glassdoorbenefits.compress.gd.jpg" alt="undefined" width="621" height="414"/><br/></p> <p>As we focus on creating the best player experiences, we also strive to create a place where Rioters will thrive. Here are a few of the benefits for Rioters in Los Angeles:</p> <p><strong>THE BASICS</strong></p> <ul> <li>Highly competitive salary</li> <li>Choice between four subsidized HMO and PPO medical insurance plans</li> <li>Subsidized vision insurance plan</li> <li>PPO dental insurance plan</li> <li>Benefits coverage for domestic partners</li> <li>Matching 401k</li> <li>Short term and long term disability insurance</li> <li>Life insurance (free basic life insurance, plus voluntary life insurance)<br/></li> </ul> <p><strong>PERKS BEYOND THE NORM</strong></p> <ul> <li><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.4em;">Open PTO</span><br/></li> <li>Flexible hours</li> <li>On-site, full service cafeteria offering fully subsidized meals and&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/Bilgewater.jpg">coffee bar</a><br/></li> <li>All-company “Show and Tells”, &quot;Taste the Riot&quot; fairs and <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://thunderdome.riotgames.com/">&quot;Thunderdome&quot; hackathons </a>(infused with adult beverages)</li> <li><a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.4em;" href="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/PC%20Bang.jpg">On-site PC Bang</a>&nbsp;and arcade</li> <li><a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20121029/531/funding-riots-play">Annual Riot Play Fund</a></li> <li>Daily <em>League of Legends</em> play tests</li> <li>Office kitchens stocked with free cereal, fresh fruit, snacks, tea and fresh ground coffee&nbsp;</li> <li>Ongoing education and training through Riot U</li> <li><a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/Corner%20exterior.jpg">Top-of-the-line computers and peripherals</a></li> <li>Weekly visits from certified masseuses</li> <li>Subsidized gym membership</li> <li><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.4em;">Submit your champion ideas directly to the dudes and dudettes who make 'em real</span></li> <li>Riot Games and <em>League of Legends</em> apparel and promotional items<br/></li> </ul> <p>It's Riot Games, Inc., policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of the Riot team. Riot doesn't unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law. Riot also makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters.</p></div> <div class='fadeOut gradient hidden'></div> <div class='link moreBar hidden'> <span>Read more</span> <i class='arrowSm margLtSm'></i> </div> </div> <div id='WhyWorkForUsTab-9736' class='overviewSectionBody offScreen' data-created='2013-08-21 11:47:42.48' data-updated='2017-03-25 02:51:33.76'> <div id='WhyWorkForUs-9736' class='employerSuppliedContent'> <p><img class="lazy" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/eep/247538/Internship2013.compress.gd.jpg" alt="" width="612" height="365"/></p> <p>If you're an ambitious undergrad or grad student who shares our passion for games (especially <em>League of Legends</em>) and are eager to get into scrapes with challenging work, think about spending next summer with us. Look for info on remaining open intern positions and our 2016 Internship Program <a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/internship-program">here</a>.</p> <p>Each hosting team will supply its interns with meaty projects, honest mentorship and lots of opportunities to get to know Riot Games overall. Interns will playtest new champions and features, gain first-hand experience serving on the front lines of player support, attend leadership seminars and industry education via Riot U, enjoy events with the rest of Riot including Riot Rumble, <em>League</em> skills training, and early new movie screenings. Riot interns also receive housing for the summer.</p> <p>Check out the FAQ for more info about Summer&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/riot-internships/faq">NA</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.riotgames.com/open-positions-0">EU</a>&nbsp;internships and deets on the application process - this'll help you prepare for next year's application period.</p></div> <div class='fadeOut gradient hidden'></div> <div class='link moreBar hidden'> <span>Read more</span> <i class='arrowSm margLtSm'></i> </div> </div> <div id='WhyWorkForUsTab-9737' class='overviewSectionBody offScreen' data-created='2013-08-21 11:47:42.483' data-updated='2017-03-25 02:51:33.763'> <div id='WhyWorkForUs-9737' class='employerSuppliedContent'> <p><img class="lazy" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/eep/247538/RiotGamesParty_055.compress.gd.jpg" alt="undefined" width="613" height="402"/></p> <p><img class="lazy" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/eep/247538/riotmanifesto3.compress.gd.png" alt="undefined" width="621" height="919"/></p></div> <div class='fadeOut gradient hidden'></div> <div class='link moreBar hidden'> <span>Read more</span> <i class='arrowSm margLtSm'></i> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div where researchers collaborate with players who join us onsite to understand their wants, needs, perceptions, and behaviors.' class='companyPhoto lazy'/> </figure> </a><div class='cta hidden'> <p class='noMargTop'> Have you worked here?</p> <a href='/survey/photos/choose_input.htm?employerId=247538&contentOriginHook=SIDEBAR_PHOTOS' class='gd-btn gd-btn-link gradient gd-btn-1 gd-btn-med '> <span>Share a Photo</span><i class='hlpr'></i> </a> </div> </div> </div> <a href='/Photos/Riot-Games-Office-Photos-E247538.htm' class='moreBar'> <span class='middle link'>See All Photos</span><i class='arrowSm rt margLtSm'><span>See All</span></i> </a> </div> <div id='EmpPhotosEngageLbFrame-247538' class='hidden'> <div class='lbSlideFrame'> <div class='titleBar'> <span class='viewAll'> <a href='/Photos/Riot-Games-Office-Photos-E247538.htm'><i></i><span>View All</span></a> </span> <span class='counter'> <span class="current">num</span> of <span class="total">num</span> </span> <span class='close'> <button type='button' title="Close (Esc)"><span class="offScreen">Close (Esc)</span></button> </span> </div> <div class='slides'> </div> </div> </div> <div class='module snug empStatsAndInterview'> <div class='module interviewStats'> <header> <h2>Riot Games Interviews</h2> <div class='fill tbl minor showHH'> </div> </header> <div class='interviewStatsBody'> <div class='tbl <div class="cell"> <div class='tbl dataTbl fill toggleable'> <div class="row"> <div class="cell tightTop"> <div class='h3 tightTop showHH margBot'> Getting an Interview</div> </div> <div class="cell"> </div> </div> <div class="row "> <div class="cell heading "> <i class='sqLed middle sm top '></i> <label class='minor '>Applied Online</label> </div> <div class="cell pct alignRt "> <span class='minor strong '>63</span><span class='minor '>%</span> </div> </div> <div class="row "> <div class="cell heading "> <i class='sqLed middle sm top '></i> <label class='minor '>Recruiter</label> </div> <div class="cell pct alignRt "> <span class='minor strong '>14</span><span class='minor '>%</span> </div> </div> <div class="row "> <div class="cell heading "> <i class='sqLed middle sm top '></i> <label class='minor '>Employee Referral</label> </div> <div class="cell pct alignRt "> <span class='minor strong '>13</span><span class='minor '>%</span> </div> </div> <div id="ToggleOnObtained" class='link Recruiting</label> </div> <div class="cell pct alignRt "> <span class='minor strong '>3</span><span class='minor toggleBody hidden'>%</span> </div> </div> <div class="row toggleBody"> <div class="cell '></i> <label class='minor '>In-Person</label> </div> <div class="cell pct alignRt noPad"> <span class='minor strong '>0</span><span class='minor toggleBody hidden'>%</span> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="cell chartWrapper difficulty"> <h3 class='tightTop hideHH'> Interview Difficulty<span class='subtle normal hidden'> &nbsp; 361 Ratings</span> </h3> <div class='tbl dataTbl'> <div class="row"> <div class="cell middle center subtle"> <div class="difficultyLabel subtle"> 3.3</div> Average</div> <div class="cell ratingBar"> <h3 class='tightTop margBot'> Interview Difficulty</h3> <span class='gdBars gdRatings sm vertical ' title="3.3"> <i> </i> <span class="label minor">Hard</span> <br/> <i> <i style="height: 29.999999999999982%"></i> </i> <span class="label minor"> </span> <br/> <i> <i></i> </i> <span class="label minor">Average</span> <br/> <i> <i></i> </i> <span class="label minor"> </span> <br/> <i> <i></i> </i> <span class="label minor">Easy</span> <br/> </span> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div><div class="row"> </div> </div><div id='StacksWrapper' class="hidden toggleable"> <div class='tbl stack fill experience'> <div class="row"></div> </div> <button type='button' id='ToggleOnStats' data-toggle-body-id='MoreMobileStats' data-toggle-off-id='ToggleOffStats' class='fill toggleOn margTop gd-btn gd-btn-button gd-btn-2 gd-btn-lg gradient'> <span>See More</span><i class='hlpr'></i> </button> <div id="MoreMobileStats" class="hidden toggleBody"> <div class='tbl stack fill obtained'> <div class="row"></div> </div> <div class='tbl stack fill difficulty'> <div class="row"></div> </div> <button type='button' id='ToggleOffStats' data-toggle-body-id='MoreMobileStats' data-toggle-on-id='ToggleOnStats' class='fill toggleOff margTop gd-btn gd-btn-button gd-btn-2 gd-btn-lg gradient'> <span>See Less</span><i class='hlpr'></i> </button> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class='singleReview padHorz'> <ol class='empReviews tightLt'> <li class='empReview padVert cf ' id='InterviewReview_14143984'> <div class='cf'> <div class='floatLt'> <time class='date subtle small' datetime="2017-03-11"> Mar 11, 2017</time> </div> <p class='helpfulReviews small tightVert floatRt'> &nbsp; </p> </div> <div class='tbl fill padTop'> <div class='row'> <div class='cell sqLogoCell showDesk'> <span class='sqLogo tighten smSqLogo logoOverlay'> <img data-original='https://media.glassdoor.com/sqls/247538/riot-games-squarelogo.png' data-original-2x='https://media.glassdoor.com/sqlm/247538/riot-games-squarelogo.png' src='' class=' lazy' data-retina-ok='true' alt='Riot Games Logo' title=''/> </span> </div> <div class='cell'> <h2 class='summary strong noMargTop tightTop'> <a href='/Interview/Riot-Games-Interview-RVW14143984.htm'><span class='reviewer'>Collegiate</span> Interview</a> </h2> <div class='tbl reviewMeta'> <div class='cell middle'> <div class='author minor'> Anonymous Interview Candidate in <span class='authorLocation middle'>Santa Monica, CA</span><span class='padLtSm'><i class='flag us'></i></span> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class='tbl fill padTopSm'> <div class='row'> <div class='cell sqLogoCell showDesk'></div> <div class='cell reviewBodyCell'> <div class='interviewOutcomes'> <div class='flex-grid'> <div class='tightLt col span-1-3'> <div class='middle'> <div class="cell"><i class='sqLed middle sm red margRtSm '></i> </div><div class="cell"><span class='middle'>No Offer</span> </div></div></div> <div class='tightLt col span-1-3'> <div class='middle'> <div class="cell"><i class='sqLed middle sm yellow margRtSm '></i> </div><div class="cell"><span class='middle'>Neutral Experience</span> </div></div></div> <div class='tightLt col span-1-3'> <div class='middle'> <div class="cell"><i class='sqLed middle sm red margRtSm '></i> </div><div class="cell"><span class='middle'>Difficult Interview</span> </div></div></div> </div> </div> <div class='description '> <div class='interviewReviewDetails truncateData' data-animate-after-less='true' data-click-anywhere='true' data-less-str='Show Less' data-more-str='Show More' data-truncate-toggle='true' data-truncate-words='70'> <p class="strong tightBot">Application</p> <p class='applicationDetails noMargTop margBot'>I applied online. I interviewed at Riot Games (Santa Monica, CA).</p> <p class="strong tightBot">Interview</p> <p class='interviewDetails noMargTop margBot truncateThis wrapToggleStr '>I applied via the website and was contacted for a phone interview during a slot within the following 3-4 days. My interview started late and was surprisingly nerve-wracking considering the Collegiate spot had the most casual application (I didn&#039;t think it would be as competitive as more popular ones like eSports). The interviewer was kind and organized, but it was kind of unprofessional when they used swear words.</p> <p class="strong tightVert">Interview Questions</p> <div class='interviewQuestions noMargTop margBot'> <ul class='undecorated'> <li> <span class='interviewQuestion noPadVert truncateThis wrapToggleStr' data-truncate-words='70'>How do you think this internship will help you to pursue your planned career? &nbsp;</span> <a href="/Interview/How-do-you-think-this-internship-will-help-you-to-pursue-your-planned-career-QTN_1947306.htm" class="questionResponse">Answer Question</a></li> </ul> </div> </div> <span class='hidden'> <span class="item"> <span class="fn"> Riot Games</span> </span> <span class='dtreviewed'> 2017-03-11 11:39 PST</span> </span> </div> </div> </div> </div> </li> </ol> </div> <a class='moreBar margTop' href="/Interview/Riot-Games-Interview-Questions-E247538.htm"> See All 379 Interviews<i class='arrowSm rt margLtSm'></i> </a> </div> <div id='Awards' data-review-url='/survey/start_execute.htm?showSurvey=REVIEWS&employerId=247538&employerName=Riot Games&contentOriginHook=PAGE_INFOSITE_BOTTOM'> <h2>Work at Riot Games? Share Your Experiences</h2> <div class='tbl'> <div class='cell skinny'> <span class='sqLogo tighten medSqLogo logo margRt'> <img data-original='https://media.glassdoor.com/sqls/247538/riot-games-squarelogo.png' data-original-2x='https://media.glassdoor.com/sqlm/247538/riot-games-squarelogo.png' src='' class=' lazy' data-retina-ok='true' alt='Riot Games Logo' title=''/> </span> </div> <div class='cell chubby'> <div class='h2 noMarg'>Riot Games</div> <div class='tbl fill'> <div class='cell chubby'> <div class='selectRatingControl p noMargTop margBotSm'> <ul class='undecorated'> <li> <i><span>Star</span></i> <label forId='ContributeOverallRating_1' for='ContributeOverallRating_1' title="Very Dissatisfied" class='offScreen'>Very Dissatisfied</label> <input type='radio' class='radio hidden' name='ContributeOverallRating' id='ContributeOverallRating_1' value='1'/> </li> <li> <i><span>Star</span></i> <label forId='ContributeOverallRating_2' for='ContributeOverallRating_2' title="Dissatisfied" class='offScreen'>Dissatisfied</label> <input type='radio' class='radio hidden' Satisfied" class='offScreen'>Very Satisfied</label> <input type='radio' class='radio hidden' name='ContributeOverallRating' id='ContributeOverallRating_5' value='5'/> </li> </ul> <span class='hoverText hidden hideHH'>&nbsp;</span> <span class='selectedText hideHH'>&nbsp;</span> <div class='prompt ib hideHH'> <span class='promptText'>Click to Rate</span> </div> </div> <div> <label <div class='cell skinny padLt borderRt hideMob'></div> <div class='cell skinny middle padHorz padTopLg h2 hideMob'>or</div> <div class='cell middle padTopLg hideMob'> <ul class='contribAlts Games&amp;contentOriginHook=PAGE_INFOSITE_BOTTOM'>Add a Salary</a> </li> <li class='noMarg'> <a Benefits</a> </li> <li class='noMarg hideMob'> <a href='/survey/start_execute.htm?showSurvey=INTERVIEWS&amp;interviewEmployerId=247538&amp;interviewEmployerName=Riot Games&amp;contentOriginHook=PAGE_INFOSITE_BOTTOM'>Add an Interview</a> </li> </ul> </div> </div> <div class='showMob'> <ul class='contribAlts undecorated noWrap'> <li class='noMarg'> <a </div> </div> </div> </div> </article> <aside id='ZCol'> <div class='adSlotContainer'> </div> <div class='featuredJobsAdSlot adSlot-employerInfo-overview-lf-right-holder'> </div> <div class='videoPlayer'> <div class='vidContainer margTopSm'> <div class='spinner' id='VideoModule-1-ytPlayer'> <i class='spinner24'></i> <p> Loading...</p> </div> </div> <div class='vidControl hidden cf 	$(function() {
	
			var videoList = [
				
				{
					type: "YOUTUBE_VIDEO_URL",
					url: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iBMWa3NfqKYhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RE4s9X2MNFM"
				},
				{
					type: "YOUTUBE_VIDEO_URL",
					url: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A43u58HQ-A8"
				}
			];
		

		if(typeof videoList !== "undefined") {
			$('#VideoModule-1').gdVideoPlayer({
				
				titleContainerSelector:	"",
				maxTitleLength: 45,
				showHD: false,
				isSecure: true,
				useTitleQuotes: true,
				useTitleSeparatorPrefix: true,
				mobile: false,
				channel: "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJEGvSZnQ1pkVfHO8s5G8hA/videos",
				channelProvider: "CUSTOM",
				videos: videoList
			});
		}
	});
</script> </div> <a href='https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJEGvSZnQ1pkVfHO8s5G8hA/videos' target='_blank' rel='nofollow' class='moreBar margTop'> <span class='middle'>See All</span> <i class='arrowSm rt margLtSm'><span>See All</span></i> </a> </div> <div id='OverviewBlog' class='bucket module hidden noMargTop'> <h2 class='bucketTitle'> <span class='tbl fill'> <span class='cell middle'> From RiotGames.com</span> <nav class='dataState cell middle alignRt noWrap p'> <a class='middle mmLink seeMoreLink hidden'> <span class='middle'>See All</span><i class="arrowSm rt margLtSm"></i> </a> </nav> </span></h2> <div class='bucketBody cf'> <div id='OverviewBlogBody'></div> <script defer>
	
	GD.afterLoad(function() {
		if(typeof GD.news === 'undefined') {
			return;
		}

		var             blog = new GD.news.RssReader('#OverviewBlogBody');
		var             rssOptions = {
			maxPosts:                       3,
			containerSelector:      '#OverviewBlog',
			showFeedTitle:          false,
			showAuthor:                     false,
			showDate:                       true,
			showSnippet:            false,
			dateClass:                      'minor',
			moreNewsLinkText:       "Riot Games Blog",
			onCompleteCallback:     function() {
				var overviewBlog$ 	  = $('#OverviewBlog'),
					overviewBlogBody$ = $('#OverviewBlogBody');

				if(!overviewBlogBody$.is(':empty')) {
					overviewBlog$.slideDown();
				}
			},
			seeMoreLinkSelector: '#OverviewBlog .seeMoreLink'
		};

		blog.show("http://www.riotgames.com/news/feed", rssOptions);
	});
</script></div> </div> <div id='OverviewNews' class='bucket module empOverviewSection module hidden'> <h2 class='bucketTitle'> <span class='tbl fill'> <span class='cell middle'> Latest News</span> <nav class='dataState cell middle alignRt noWrap p'> <a class='middle mmLink seeMoreLink hidden'> <span class='middle'>See All</span><i class="arrowSm rt margLtSm"></i> </a> </nav> </span></h2> <div class='bucketBody cf'> <div class='contentData'> <div id='OverviewNewsBody'> </div> </div> </div> </div> </aside> </div> </div> </div> </div></div> </div> </div> </div> <footer id='PageBot' data-role='footer'> <div class='contents old-footer'> <div class='hr hideDesk'><hr/></div> <div class="flex-grid"> <div class="col span-1-1"> <p class='footerText tightVert minor'> Glassdoor gives you an inside look at what it&#039;s like to work at Riot Games, including salaries, reviews, office photos, and more. This is the Riot Games company profile. All content is posted anonymously by employees working at Riot Games.</p> </div> </div> <div class='hr'><hr/></div> <nav> <ul class="flex-grid"> <li class="span-1-3 col"> <ul class="flex-grid noFold">
